## Checklist

Before submitting this request, please ensure:

- [ ] The repository contains a `SPEC2CLOUD.md` file in the root directory
- [ ] The `SPEC2CLOUD.md` file has YAML front matter with all mandatory fields:
  - `title` (40 chars or less)
  - `description` (140 chars or less)
  - `category` (AI Apps & Agents | App Modernization | Data Centric Apps | Agentic DevOps)
  - `industry` (Cross-Industry | Financial Services | Healthcare & Life Sciences | Manufacturing | Retail & Consumer Goods | Government & Public Sector | Education | Energy & Resources | Telco & Media | Mobility & Automotive)
- [ ] The repository includes the `.github` folder with necessary files for GitHub Copilot
